local Debris = Game:GetService("Debris")
local Tool = script.Parent local ToolHandle = Tool.Handle
local summonSound = ToolHandle:FindFirstChild("Summon")
local cooldown = 4 -- Seconds until tool can be used again local timeToLive = 60 -- Seconds until the pet is destroyed local respawnTime = 4 -- Seconds until pet can be re-summoned (only after death)
local myModel local myTorso local myHumanoid
local pet local aiScript local animScript
local function summon() if not myTorso or not myHumanoid then return end
pet = Game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(87350670):GetChildren()[1] Debris:AddItem(pet, timeToLive) -- Make sure it will get deleted
if pet and pet:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and pet.Humanoid.Health > 0 then pet.Parent = myModel
if summonSound then summonSound:Play() end
ToolHandle.Transparency = 1.0
while pet.Humanoid.Health < 350 do pet.Humanoid.Health = 350 -- Health has problems being set directly wait() end
-- Clone original aiScript to myModel local aiScriptOriginal = Tool:FindFirstChild("ChimeraAi") if aiScriptOriginal then aiScript = aiScriptOriginal:Clone() Debris:AddItem(aiScript, timeToLive) aiScript.Parent = myModel
while not aiScript:FindFirstChild("Pet") do wait() end aiScript.Pet.Value = pet
aiScript.Disabled = false end
-- Clone original animScript to myModel local animScriptOriginal = Tool:FindFirstChild("PetAnimation") if animScriptOriginal then animScript = animScriptOriginal:Clone() Debris:AddItem(animScript, timeToLive) animScript.Parent = myModel animScript.Disabled = false end
-- On pet death, clean up and show the handle pet.Humanoid.Died:connect(function() Debris:AddItem(aiScript, 0) Debris:AddItem(aiScript, 0) Debris:AddItem(pet, respawnTime) wait(respawnTime) ToolHandle.Transparency = 0.0 end)
-- After timeToLive, show the handle coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(timeToLive + 0.1) if not pet:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then ToolHandle.Transparency = 0.0 end end))
pet:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-3, 3), 0, math.random(-3, 3))) end end
local function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled or not myTorso or not myHumanoid then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if not pet or not pet.Parent then summon() end
-- Raycast to click location for ClickTarget setting local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - myTorso.Position).unit local hit = Game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(myTorso.Position, direction * 150), myModel) if hit and pet and pet:FindFirstChild("ClickTarget") then local clickedHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if clickedHumanoid and clickedHumanoid.Health > 0 then pet.ClickTarget.Value = clickedHumanoid else pet.ClickTarget.Value = nil end end
wait(cooldown)
Tool.Enabled = true end
local function onEquipped() myModel = Tool.Parent myTorso = myModel:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = myModel:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
local function onUnequipped() if pet then pet:Destroy() end if aiScript then aiScript:Destroy() end if summonSound then summonSound:Stop() end ToolHandle.Transparency = 0.0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Debris = Game:GetService("Debris")
-- Constants --
local offset = Vector3.new(5, 0, 5) -- Distance from player local timeBetweenShots = 0.25 -- Seconds between each poison shot (between animations) local chaseTime = 10 -- How long to chase a target before giving up local chanceToBurn = 0.5 -- % chance that biting will also burn the target local chanceToPoison = 0.5 -- % chance that biting will also poison the target
-- Script Children --
local myModel = script.Parent local myHumanoid = myModel:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local ballScript = script:FindFirstChild("FireBall") local burnScript = ballScript:FindFirstChild("Burning")
local blobScript = script:FindFirstChild("PoisonBlob") local poisonScript = blobScript:FindFirstChild("Poisoned")
local roarAnimation = script:FindFirstChild("QuadHeadUp") local tailAnimation = script:FindFirstChild("TailShoot")
while not script:FindFirstChild("Pet") or not script.Pet.Value do wait() end local pet = script.Pet.Value
while not pet:FindFirstChild("ClickTarget") do wait() end local targetHumanoid = pet.ClickTarget.Value
while not myModel:FindFirstChild("PetAnimation") do wait() end local petAnimScript = myModel.PetAnimation
-- Chimera Variables --
while not pet:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") or not pet:FindFirstChild("Head") or not pet:FindFirstChild("Tail") do wait() end
local petHumanoid = pet.Humanoid local petHead = pet.Head local petTail = pet.Tail
local roarSound = petHead:FindFirstChild("FieryRoar") local chompSound = petHead:FindFirstChild("Chomp") local snakeSound = petTail:FindFirstChild("Snake") local shootSound = petTail:FindFirstChild("Whoosh")
local fireBall = Instance.new("Part") do fireBall.Name = "FireBall" fireBall.Transparency = 1 fireBall.CanCollide = false fireBall.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth fireBall.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth fireBall.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4) Instance.new("BodyForce", fireBall).force = Vector3.new(0, fireBall:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) -- Antigravity Instance.new("Fire", fireBall) -- Fire it up local scriptClone = ballScript:Clone() scriptClone.Parent = fireBall scriptClone:FindFirstChild("Creator").Value = pet end
local poisonBlob = Instance.new("Part") do poisonBlob.Name = "PoisonBlob" poisonBlob.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Lime green") poisonBlob.CanCollide = false poisonBlob.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth poisonBlob.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth poisonBlob.Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.66, 0.25) Instance.new("BodyForce", poisonBlob).force = Vector3.new(0, poisonBlob:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) -- Antigravity local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh", poisonBlob) mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=87142124" mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.4, 0.2) local scriptClone = blobScript:Clone() scriptClone.Parent = poisonBlob scriptClone:FindFirstChild("Creator").Value = pet end
local petMode = 0 local startTime = 0
-- Functions --
local function stop() targetHumanoid = myHumanoid petMode = 0 end
-- Function that updates the target (when the player clicks) pet.ClickTarget.Changed:connect(function(newValue) if newValue and newValue:IsA("Humanoid") then targetHumanoid = newValue if petMode == 0 then petMode = math.random(2, 3) -- (1 is not a targeted attack) startTime = time() end else stop() end end)
-- Returns the closest living Humanoid to position who isn't in excludeList local function findClosestHumanoid(position, excludeList) -- (Vector3, table) if not position then print("Need a Vector3 position") return nil end
-- Change list values to keys so we can use indexing local excludeSet = {} if excludeList and type(excludeList) == "table" then for _, l in ipairs(excludeList) do excludeSet[l] = true end end
-- Search through workspace children local list = Game.Workspace:getChildren() local closestHumanoid = nil for i = 1, #list do item = list[i] if (item and item:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and item.Humanoid.Health > 0 and not excludeSet[item.Humanoid]) and (not closestHumanoid or (item.Humanoid.Torso.Position - position).magnitude < (closestHumanoid.Torso.Position - position).magnitude) then closestHumanoid = item.Humanoid end end return closestHumanoid --NOTE: Can be nil end
-- Coroutine to decide when to automatically start coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(4) while pet do if petMode == 0 and math.random() < 0.33 then targetHumanoid = findClosestHumanoid(myHumanoid.Torso.Position, {myHumanoid, petHumanoid}) if targetHumanoid then petMode = math.random(3) else -- No other living humanoids nearby petMode = 1 end startTime = time() end wait(6) end end))
-- Clones theScript to the target if it doesn't already exist there local function cloneScriptToTarget(theScript, target) if theScript and target and not target:FindFirstChild(theScript.Name) then local scriptClone = theScript:Clone() scriptClone.Parent = target scriptClone.Disabled = false end end
-- Rotates the pet to face the target local function faceTarget() if petHumanoid and petHumanoid.Torso then local position = petHumanoid.Torso.Position local lookPoint = targetHumanoid.Torso.Position petHumanoid.Torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(position, Vector3.new(lookPoint.x, position.y, lookPoint.z)) -- Face target but stay horizontal end end
-- Tells petAnimScript to try to play the animation local function sendAnimation(animation) if petAnimScript and petAnimScript:FindFirstChild("Current") then petAnimScript.Current.Value = animation --NOTE: Allowed to be nil end end
-- Main Pet AI Loop
while true do if not myHumanoid or not myHumanoid.Torso or not petHumanoid or not petHumanoid.Torso or not petHead then break end
-- Jumping over obstacles local hit = Game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(petHead.Position, petHead.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0), nil) if hit and hit.Parent ~= myModel then petHumanoid.Jump = true end
if petMode == 0 then -- Default: Follow the player petHumanoid:MoveTo(myHumanoid.Torso.Position + offset, myHumanoid.Torso) elseif petMode == 1 then -- Mode 1: Fire-breathing roar! petHumanoid:MoveTo(petHumanoid.Torso.Position, petHumanoid.Torso) -- Stand still (reset possible move target) if roarAnimation then sendAnimation(roarAnimation) end wait(0.25) -- Animating: Head up if roarSound then roarSound:Play() end for i = -0.20, 0.25, 0.05 do -- 10 times local ballClone = fireBall:Clone() ballClone.Parent = Workspace ballClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(petHead.Position) ballClone.FireBall.Disabled = false -- Ball armed ballClone.Velocity = (petHead.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, i * math.pi, 0)).lookVector * 30 Debris:AddItem(ballClone, 2.5) wait(0.25) -- Animation is holding still for 2.5 seconds end wait(0.25) -- Animating: Head down sendAnimation(nil) stop() elseif petMode == 2 then -- Mode 2: Shoot poison at target if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Torso and targetHumanoid.Health > 0 then petHumanoid:MoveTo(petHumanoid.Torso.Position, petHumanoid.Torso) -- Stand still (reset possible move target) if snakeSound then snakeSound:Play() end do -- Follow target until sound finishes (Sound:IsPlaying is buggy) local startTime = time() repeat faceTarget() wait() until time() - startTime > 1.5 end local totalShots = math.random(3, 6) for i = 1, totalShots do if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Health <= 0 then break end if tailAnimation then sendAnimation(tailAnimation) end wait(0.5) -- Animating: Pull back if shootSound then shootSound:Play() end wait(0.1) -- Animating: Fire if petTail and petHead and targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Health > 0 and targetHumanoid.Torso then local blobClone = poisonBlob:Clone() blobClone.Parent = Workspace local spawnPoint = petHead.Position blobClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPoint, targetHumanoid.Torso.Position) -- Facing is off blobClone.CFrame = blobClone.CFrame - blobClone.CFrame.p -- Remove position from CFrame blobClone.CFrame = blobClone.CFrame + spawnPoint -- Add new position to CFrame blobClone.CFrame = blobClone.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi / 2, 0, 0) -- Facing fixed blobClone.PoisonBlob.Disabled = false -- Blob armed blobClone.Velocity = (targetHumanoid.Torso.Position - petTail.Position).unit * 100 Debris:AddItem(blobClone, 2) end wait(0.15) -- Animating: Reset sendAnimation(nil) wait(timeBetweenShots) faceTarget() end end stop() elseif petMode == 3 then -- Mode 3: Chase and bite the target if targetHumanoid and targetHumanoid.Torso and targetHumanoid.Health > 0 then if time() - startTime > chaseTime then -- Give up trying to reach target stop() elseif (targetHumanoid.Torso.Position - petHumanoid.Torso.Position).magnitude > offset.magnitude then -- Get up close petHumanoid:MoveTo(targetHumanoid.Torso.Position, targetHumanoid.Torso) else -- We've reached the player, bite 'em petHumanoid.Jump = true wait(0.25) -- Imagine the fear in their eyes at this moment if targetHumanoid then if chompSound then chompSound:Play() end targetHumanoid:TakeDamage(math.random(30, 60)) if math.random() > 0.5 then -- Equal chance for burn-check or poison-check if math.random() <= chanceToBurn then cloneScriptToTarget(burnScript, targetHumanoid) end else if math.random() <= chanceToPoison then cloneScriptToTarget(poisonScript, targetHumanoid) end end end stop() end else stop() end end
wait() end

local Ball = script.Parent local BurnScript = script.Burning local Creator = script.Creator.Value
-- OnTouched: Do damage, move BurnScript, and destroy Ball Ball.Touched:connect(function(otherPart) if otherPart and otherPart.Parent and otherPart.Parent:IsA("Model") then local otherModel = otherPart.Parent if otherModel ~= Creator and not otherModel:IsAncestorOf(Creator) then local humanoid = otherModel:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then humanoid:TakeDamage(10) BurnScript.Parent = humanoid BurnScript.Disabled = false Ball:Destroy() end end end end)

-- Burn the humanoid this script is attached to local victim = script.Parent if victim and victim:IsA("Humanoid") then local fire = Instance.new("Fire", victim.Torso) for i = 1, 8 do if not fire or not fire.Enabled or not victim or victim.Health <= 0 then break end victim:TakeDamage(2) wait(1.5) end if fire then fire:Destroy() end end script:Destroy()

local Blob = script.Parent local PoisonScript = script.Poisoned local Creator = script.Creator.Value
-- OnTouched: Do damage, move PoisonScript, and destroy Blob Blob.Touched:connect(function(otherPart) if otherPart and otherPart.Parent and otherPart.Parent:IsA("Model") then local otherModel = otherPart.Parent if otherModel ~= Creator and not otherModel:IsAncestorOf(Creator) then local humanoid = otherModel:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then humanoid:TakeDamage(5) PoisonScript.Parent = humanoid PoisonScript.Disabled = false Blob:Destroy() end end end end)

-- Poison the humanoid this script is attached to local victim = script.Parent if victim and victim:IsA("Humanoid") then local victimHead = victim.Parent:FindFirstChild("Head") local originalColor = victimHead.BrickColor for i = 1, 5 do if not victimHead or not victim or victim.Health <= 0 then break end victimHead.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Lime green") victim:TakeDamage(5) wait(1.5) if not victimHead then break end victimHead.BrickColor = originalColor wait(1.5) end end script:Destroy()

while not script:FindFirstChild("Current") do wait() end
local myModel = script.Parent
-- Safely wait for petHumanoid local petHumanoid = nil if myModel then local aiScript = myModel:FindFirstChild("ChimeraAi") if aiScript then while not aiScript:FindFirstChild("Pet") do wait() end local pet = aiScript.Pet.Value if pet then petHumanoid = pet:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end end end
-- When Current is changed, tell petHumanoid to play the Animation there if petHumanoid then script.Current.Changed:connect(function(newValue) if petHumanoid and newValue and newValue:IsA("Animation") then local animationTrack = petHumanoid:LoadAnimation(newValue) if animationTrack then animationTrack:Play() end end end) end
